task.title: Generating a report of meeting participants
task.shortdesc: The meeting moderator can generate a report of meeting participants.

taskbody.context: You must be in an active meeting and the meeting moderator to generate a participant report. The report provides the time when a participant enters and leaves a meeting.

step.cmd: Click the participant icon to open the list of the current participants.
Click the download icon () at the top of the list.
step.info: The report opens in a new window as a PDF. You can create a participant report multiple times within a meeting. Each report opens in a new windows.

step.cmd: Using the task bar at the top of the window, you can print and download the report.
step.info: When downloading the file, the default name is meeting_name_ date_attendance_time.

step.cmd: Close the window to close the report. The report is not saved when closed.
